snippet: LEAD: Sir James Goldsmith's $21 billion bid for B.A.T. Industries could be complicated by state regulations concerning any change in ownership of B.A.T.'s American insurance subsidiary, the Farmers Group Inc., analysts and regulators said today....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Sir James Goldsmith's $21 billion bid for B.A.T. Industries could be complicated by state regulations concerning any change in ownership of B.A.T.'s American insurance subsidiary, the Farmers Group Inc., analysts and regulators said today.

headline.main: State Insurance Laws Could Slow B.A.T. Bid

byline.original: By RICHARD W. STEVENSON, Special to The New York Times
